#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		char name[8], g[110];
		scanf("%s%s",name,g);
		int i, count[26];
		for( i = 0 ; i < 26 ; i++ )
			count[i] = 0;
		for( i = 0 ; g[i] != '\0' ; i++ )
		{
			count[ g[i] - 'a' ]++;
		}
		int jud = 0;
		for( i = 0 ; i < 26 ; i++ )
		{
			jud = jud ^ count[i];
		}
		if(jud != 0)
		{
			printf("%s\n",name);
		}
		else
		{
			if(name[0] == 'T')
				printf("Varun\n");
			else
				printf("Tarun\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
